biography: Alex Solowitz (born December 15, 1979) is an American actor, known for being part of 2gether, a fictional boy band portrayed in a movie and TV series of the same name.  He had a recurring role on Veronica Mars and guest-starred on many other television shows, including Everybody Loves Raymond, Just Shoot Me!, ER, Cousin Skeeter, Last Man Standing, 911, and The Rookie.  As for movies, Solowitz appeared in Garden in The Night, Never Been Kissed and Alpha Dog, among other.
name: Alex Solowitz
place_of_birth: San Fernando Valley, Los Angeles, California, USA
